Solitaire Collection vous propose désormais une expérience encore plus exceptionnelle en réunissant cinq jeux de cartes différents en un :\r\n\r\nKlondike\r\nIl s'agit de la version classique et intemporelle, plus connue sous le nom de \"\"Solitaire\"\". Engagez les Drivatars de vos amis pour qu'ils vous aident à gagner de nouveaux fans et à agrandir votre festival. Formez des convois avec eux pour explorer l'univers du jeu, même lorsqu'ils sont hors ligne. Le jeu croisé entre plusieurs appareils est uniquement disponible dans les pays où Xbox Live est pris en charge. vous facilite la vie en vous permettant de gérer en toute sécurité vos mots de passe et toutes sortes d'identifiants. Vous n'avez qu'à vous souvenir d'un seul mot de passe principal pour Enpass.\r\n\r\nENPASS EST IMBATTABLE\r\n• Aucune de vos données n'est stockée sur les serveurs de l'entreprise.\r\n• Pas besoin de vous inscrire ou de vous abonner.\r\n• Synchronise les données sur tous les appareils mobiles et les ordinateurs via iCloud, Dropbox, Google Drive, OneDrive & WebDAV.\r\n• Plus de 80 modèles pré-définis pour enregistrer toutes sortes d'informations.\r\n• Facile à utiliser grâce à un design simple et cohérent.\r\n\r\nSIMPLIFIE VOTRE VIE\r\n• Ce n'est pas difficile de s'inscrire sur des nouveaux sites web avec un mot de passe sécurisé puisque le gestionnaire de mot de passe intégré vous permet de créer des mots de passe robustes et uniques dans le style souhaité.\r\n• Achats en ligne confortables et sécurisés. Saisit vos mots de passe, cartes de crédit et adresses au moyen de l'extension Enpass.\r\n• Prend en charge l'utilisation Windows Hello pour déverrouiller rapidement l'accès aux informations. \r\n• Il ne s'agit pas seulement de mots de passe. Vous pouvez même enregistrer des pièces jointes, des comptes bancaires, des adresses pour le remplissage automatique, des numéros de Sécurité Sociale, des documents de voyage et toutes sortes d'identifiants en votre possession.\r\n\r\nPOUR ENPASS, LA SÉCURITÉ EST PRIMORDIALE\r\n• Notre philosophie, c'est votre sécurité ! Nous utilisons SQLCIPHER, une extension SQLite open-source transparente, largement reconnue pour le chiffrage de vos données au moyen d'une clé AES-256 dérivée de 100 000 itérations de PBKDF2-HMAC-SHA256.\r\n• Vos données restent toujours chiffrées grâce à votre mot de passe principale et demeurent en sécurité même si vous perdez votre appareil.\r\n• Enpass se verrouille automatiquement lorsqu'il n'est pas en cours d'utilisation.\r\n\r\nENPASS EST POUR TOUT LE MONDE\r\n• Quelle que soit votre plateforme préférée, vous pourrez y trouver Enpass.\r\n• Collaborez avec votre famille et vos collègues en utilisant de Multiple coffres synchronisés par des comptes partagés sur le cloud.\r\n• Un design simple qui convient à tout le monde.\r\n• Si vous stockez déjà vos mots de passe dans un autre logiciel, vous pouvez les importer dans Enpass en utilisant notre version de bureau gratuite. En savoir plus sur https://www.enpass.io/docs/desktop/import_export.html.\r\n\r\nOBTENEZ LE MEILLEUR DE ENPASS\r\n• La version gratuite de Enpass pour cette plateforme ne présente aucune restriction en ce qui concerne l'accès à vos données. MUSIC, NATURALLY.\r\nStaffPad is a groundbreaking music notation application, featuring advanced handwriting recognition. Write music, using your digital pen*, and StaffPad will transform your handwritten notation into a beautifully typeset score which you can then edit, play back, print and share. For composers and musicians, StaffPad revolutionises the art of writing music.\r\n\r\n*IMPORTANT NOTE: STAFFPAD **REQUIRES** A DEVICE WITH ACTIVE PEN CAPABILITIES. DESIGNED FOR SURFACE.\r\n\r\nMUSIC RECOGNITION\r\nStaffPad has been designed from the ground up for pen input. Simply write your music straight on to the screen, using your device’s pen. As you move from bar to bar, StaffPad will convert your handwriting into a beautifully engraved score. You can draw notes, beams, stems, articulations, accidentals, slurs, ties and more. It’s the most natural way to write music on digital device, ever.\r\n\r\nAN ORCHESTRA IN THE TIP OF YOUR PEN\r\nStaffPad contains a bespoke playback engine, and an entire orchestra which has been meticulously recorded and programmed to play back your score with incredible realism. Multiple dynamics layers, multiple recorded articulations, repetition samples and smart playback rules ensure that what you see is what you hear. The entire symphony orchestra is represented, and more instruments are available to purchase from the in-app store.\r\n\r\nStaffPad is powerful. Everything from a basic piano lead sheet to a full symphony score can be written with StaffPad.\r\n\r\nA BEAUTIFUL EXPERIENCE\r\nWriting music should be the focus of a composer. StaffPad handles everything else for you whilst you work. The interface has been designed to reduce clutter, and is context sensitive - showing only the information you want, when you want it.\r\n\r\nPEN AND TOUCH\r\nBy combining the power of digital inking and multitouch, we can offer a no-compromises approach to virtual manuscript. Use your finger to move around the score, and pinch to zoom - with butter-smooth scrolling. When you want to write music, just use the pen. Use your eraser button on the pen to remove both ink strokes and existing notation. You can also draw freehand on the score, using the sketch layer, to quickly brainstorm and leave notes/comments for yourself and others.\r\n\r\nPRINT YOUR RESULTS\r\nStaffPad will intelligently layout the score when it’s time to print. You can print the entire score, as well as individual parts for each musician. StaffPad has smart collision avoidance and music layout rules which handle the reflowing of the music to a page-based layout automatically.\r\n\r\nSHARE YOUR WORK\r\nStaffPad allows you to easily share and export your work. You can export MIDI and MusicXML, should you wish to continue working on your score in other programs. You can also export your score to MP3/WAV format, or quickly email an MP3 of your work in just a couple of taps. StaffPad also supports import of MusicXML and MIDI files.\r\n\r\nSCORE SYNC AND AUTO-SAVE\r\nStaffPad is always saving your score, and keeping track of versions - which you can return to at anytime. By saving your scores to OneDrive, you can ensure that your scores are kept in sync across all your devices. StaffPad also syncs your settings and preferences. You can also organise your scores into ‘collections’, meaning that your scores and projects stay neatly organised, for easy access. You can even pin frequently accessed scores straight to the Start Screen.\r\n\r\nCOMPOSER ASSISTANT\r\nA voice activated composer assistant allows you to interact with your score using your voice. Want to change the key signature to G major at bar 10? No problem - tap the assistant and say \"Change to G major at bar 10\". The assistant can quickly help you set up your score, adding instruments, setting the tempo, the key signature, the time signature, adding barlines, playing from rehearsal marks or specific bars, printing, exporting and transposing your score. Currently, the voice assistant is available in US and UK English only.\r\n\r\nEXPRESS YOURSELF\r\nStaffPad is the first notation application which allows you to easily draw dynamics/music expression data right onto the staff. By toggling the expression layer, you can elegantly draw in additional dynamics detail, which can enhance the realism of playback without compromising the existing dynamics markings on your score.\r\n\r\nPROFESSIONAL FEATURES\r\nStaffPad intelligently handles transposing instruments, allowing you to write in concert pitch and toggle to transposing when you’re ready, or when printing. You can write music in multiple voices, transpose selections, reverse stem directions, quickly repeat bars and insert text intuitively via the  quick input tiles. Quick symbols provide the easiest way to enter trills, tremolos, fermatas, rehearsal marks, pedal markings, hairpins and much more.\r\n\r\nEDUCATION\r\nStaffPad is designed for professional composers and musicians, but it’s also a great learning tool for students. Within the application there are multiple video tutorials explaining how to use the app, and key musical concepts. \r\n\r\nCOMPATIBILITY:\r\nStaffPad REQUIRES a device with a digital pen (also known as an active digitiser) and multitouch capabilities in order to function as designed*. If your device does not support pen and touch, the app will not function correctly. Support will not be available to users attempting to run StaffPad on an incompatible device.\r\n\r\n*StaffPad has been designed for Surface 3, Surface Pro 3 and Surface Pro 4.","ProductFamilyName":"Apps","Schema":"Card;1"},{"$type":"Microsoft.Marketplace.Storefront.Contracts.V8.One.CardModel, Microsoft.Marketplace.Storefront.Contracts","ProductId":"9WZDNCRDR0SF","TileLayout":"Square","Title":"One Calendar","Images":[{"$type":"Microsoft.Marketplace.Storefront.Contracts.V2.ImageItem, Microsoft.Marketplace.Storefront.Contracts","ImageType":"logo","Url":"http://store-images.s-microsoft.com/image/apps.49190.9007199266538018.100f6778-8fbb-455b-91f6-db7fabe98246.ae32a4d7-4e18-40ce-8fbf-1c4f9ee5d027","Height":300,"Width":300,"BackgroundColor":"","ForegroundColor":"","Caption":"","ImagePositionInfo":""},{"$type":"Microsoft.Marketplace.Storefront.Contracts.V2.ImageItem, Microsoft.Marketplace.Storefront.Contracts","ImageType":"logo","Url":"http://store-images.s-microsoft.com/image/apps.55864.9007199266538018.100f6778-8fbb-455b-91f6-db7fabe98246.d5b8e0e7-53ac-4a60-9f64-a826a29defb8","Height":150,"Width":150,"BackgroundColor":"","ForegroundColor":"","Caption":"","ImagePositionInfo":""}],"DisplayPrice":"Gratuit⁺","Price":0.0,"AverageRating":4.1,"RatingsCount":"240","PackageFamilyNames":["64885BlueEdge.OneCalendar_8kea50m9krsh2"],"ContentIds":["d5a560bc-c6a6-48ab-d00e-5d27aee880b9","ca82cbc6-975a-f9c0-7632-ba1b42e447f5"],"GamingOptionsXboxLive":false,"AvailableDevicesDisplayText":"  ","AvailableDevicesNarratorText":"PC,HoloLens,Mobile","TypeTag":"app","RecommendationReason":"","LongDescription":"L'application la plus populaire pour afficher tous vos calendriers tels que vos calendriers Google, Outlook, Live, Exchange ou Office365 ainsi que vos événements Facebook. is a brand-new title from the creators of This War of Mine. It’s a society survival game that asks what people are capable of when pushed to the brink of extinction. In an entirely frozen world, people develop steam-powered technology to oppose the overwhelming cold. The city’s ruler has to manage both the citizens and the infrastructure they live in. The leader’s tactical skills face challenges that will frequently question morality and the basic foundations of what we consider organized society. Optimization and resource management often clash with empathy and thoughtful decision-making. While city and society management will consume most of the ruler’s time, at some point exploration of the outside world is necessary to understand its history and present state.\r\n\r\nWhat decisions will you make to ensure the survival of your society? What will you do when pushed to the limit? And...\r\n\r\n...who will you become in the process?\r\n\r\nMAKE THE LAW\r\nSociety is a group of people who abide by the same rules and share similar beliefs. Establish laws that regulate the existence of your growing society. Decide on their working routine, healthcare, food provision and other crucial aspects of everyday life. Maintain their hope and contentment – the moral condition of your society is as important as securing the basic means to keep them fed and safe.\r\n\r\nWEIGH UP YOUR CHOICES\r\nSome of your decisions will seem small – like deciding the fate of a troubled citizen or meeting the demands of a newborn faction – but be aware that the sum of your doings can lead to unexpected results. Your people put their faith in you, but their devotion is not limitless. Leadership can be a burden.\r\n\r\nDEVELOP NEW TECHNOLOGIES\r\nSurvival demands progress. React to current events, but don’t forget about the long term and investing in development and technological progress. Providing a highly advanced infrastructure with self-powered automatons, airships and other technical wonders is difficult, but achievable. It all depends on your management and leadership skills.\r\n\r\nEXPLORE THE FROSTLAND\r\nWhile New London is your main focus, there is much more to the world than what lies within the limits of your city. Expeditions, while risky, can bring you valuable intel, precious supplies and grow your society’s population. There may be people out there, and their fate lies solely in your hands.\r\n\r\nSHAPE YOUR SOCIETY\r\nIf you reach a turning point, do not hesitate to determine the path of your people. Should you rule them with an iron fist... or show them a way of compassion and faith? Reach for extremes or try to find a fair balance. Media Player vous pourrez profiter de votre contenu multimédia préféré sur vos PC, tablettes, mobiles ainsi que sur vos grands écrans.\r\n\r\nPicture in Picture (PiP)\r\n--------------------------\r\nAvec Pip vous avez des possibilités infinies. Vous pouvez regarder deux flux en direct, regarder un film tout en jetant un oeil sur la télévision de votre enfant. Imaginez que vous pouvez lire, diffuser, et enregistrer des contenus multimédia en même temps.\r\n\r\nCasting\r\n---------\r\nAvec Duplex Media Player, la diffusion n'a jamais été aussi facile. Vous pouvez lancer la diffusion de tous les médias vers DLNA ou Chromecast mème si votre appareil ne prend pas en charge le contenu. Vous pouvez lire un flux en ligne ou du contenu stocké localement. Duplex Media Player projettera tous type de médias vers tous les appareil même si le dispositif ne le prend pas en charge (par exemple, Chromecast ne supporte pas les fichiers FLV, avec Duplex Media Player cela devient possible tout comme d'autres fichiers vers d'autres appareils Chromecast )\r\n\r\nDe plus, si vous avez une connexion réseau lente, ou que votre contenu multimédia a été codé avec un bitrate élevé, donc trop lourd, ce qui ne convient pas pour une bonne fluidité, Duplex Media Player peut générer une copie plus légère et appropriée pour une lecture fluide et en douceur.\r\n\r\nSous-titres\r\n----------\r\nEn plus de charger des sous-titres locaux, Duplex Media Player peut automatiquement rechercher et télécharger les sous-titres pour vous. Vous pouvez également configurer l'apparence des sous-titres. Enfin, la fonction de correction du temps vous permettra d'ajuster les temps des sous-titres.\r\n\r\nEnregistrement\r\n------------\r\nAvec un seul Tap, vous pouvez démarrer et arrêter l'enregistrement facilement. Vous pouvez enregistrer des flux en direct et en ligne sur votre appareil à tout moment. Même si vous utilisez Pip. Vous n'avez pas à installer de codecs externes. Once it's activated, you can drag or swipe the terminal screen to view previous lines (scroll-back mode is automatically triggered by dragging or swiping in full window mode).\r\n- On-screen keyboard is activated when you tap the cursor in Mobile devices.\r\n- In Mobile devices, tapping a session tab and closing its popup menu without selecting any menu (ex. pressing the Back button) also activates the on-screen keyboard.\r\n- Some features are disabled or hidden for Windows 10 Mobile devices based on its available memory (ex. background option may not available on smartphones with less than 2GB of memory).\r\n\r\n// RECENT IMPROVEMENTS\r\n\r\n- \"Clear Scrollback\" is added under the \"Terminal\" menu. If you want to save some previous lines, you can scroll back (SHIFT+UP) first and then select the menu; the text line buffer is cleared up to the currently visible top line.\r\n- ALT+SHIFT+P now takes a snapshot of a terminal window with its title bar and frame border. If you just want the content area, press ALT+P.\r\n- Layout Freezer is added for saving and restoring the layout of opened terminal windows\r\n- New cipher \"chacha20-poly1305@openssh.com\" is added\r\n- TCP Direct connection method now supports TLS 1.2 encryption and can be used for directly connecting to HTTPS servers\r\n- More host key types are added: ecdsa-sha2-nistp256, ecdsa-sha2-nistp384, ecdsa-sha2-nistp521, ssh-ed25519\r\n- More key exchange algorithms are added: curve25519-sha256@libssh.org, ecdh-sha2-nistp256, ecdh-sha2-nistp384, ecdh-sha2-nistp521, diffie-hellman-group-exchange-sha256\r\n- Now supports Bluetooth/RFCOMM communication. This feature can be handy when you're developing or debugging a custom Bluetooth service for IoT devices. For an example of such usage with Windows IoT on Raspberry Pi 2, please visit http://token2shell.com/howto/bluetooth-iot-sample\r\n- Proprietary printing mode (ESC[2016i) for directly previewing and printing a PDF file now supported (http://token2shell.com/howto/local-print)\r\n- Keyboard shortcuts CTRL+SHIFT+C and CTRL+SHIFT+V are added for copy and paste respectively\r\n- CTRL+SHIFT+A keyboard shortcut is added for selecting all buffered terminal lines; Token2Shell first enables its 'Find' text mode and then selects all
